name: oi4registry
description: A Registry that keeps track of all oi4 compatible members [D[A[Bmessagebus

scripts.testLocalUI: echo "Check your browser for port 5000" && npx serve OI4-Local-UI/build -s
scripts.buildAllWindows: npm run copyFetchToUI && cd ./OI4-Local-UI && npm run build && cd ../OI4-Cockpit-UI && mingw32-make.exe && cd ../OI4-Service && npm run tsc && cd ..
scripts.buildAllLinux: npm run copyFetchToUI && cd ./OI4-Local-UI && npm run build && cd ../OI4-Cockpit-UI && make && cd ../OI4-Service && npm run tsc && cd ..
scripts.installAll: cd ./OI4-Local-UI && npm install && cd ../OI4-Cockpit-UI && npm install && cd ../OI4-Service && npm install && cd ..

author: Hilscher
